Articles.Content: Almost every time I load a rocket on the pad, it jumps into the air and crashes as soon as physics start.  This effect doesn't only happen on particularly heavy rockets; my Vanguard clone does it just as much as my Delta IV.  Adding clamps does nothing -- the rocket simply shakes itself to pieces and breaks in half instead of jumping.  It's gotten to the point where I have to revert to launch one or two dozen times every single time I want to launch something just to finally get lucky enough for my rocket to only lose a few fairing panels when it loads.  I have the Real Solar System mod installed, and I have the Kerbal Joint Reenforcement as well, although the second one seems to do absolutely nothing to keep my rockets from detonating on load.
Please see this thread, and try the things it suggests, if the problem persists please provide your logs.
